casebody.data:
TOTAL RENAL CARE
v.
NCDHHS, et al. No. 44P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 4, 2008. William R. Shenton, Thomas R. West, Pamela A. Scott, Raleigh, for Total Renal Care. June S. Ferrell, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDHHS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of February 2008 by Respondent-Intervenors for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of February 2008."
